discussion_text:
good story to start with so i got my grandfather's old farm and i am trying to make everything better from 0

a new life away from cities , the game is good for spending time and relax but also farming and grinding will make u tired xD

you can enjoy it solo or coop , many animals , tress , fruits , fishes , etc... 

nice npcs you even can marry one of them also u can get a kid! xD 

nice game really and offers alot of events and things  its worth it for people who likes this kind of games ...

 [spoiler] *achievements hunters dont ever play this game if you dont want to suffer* [spoiler]

I am a 54 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2023 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.
scroll back up. get the game.
This game is so good if youre either a teenage girl (i am) or a grown ass depressed man
